overview:
Terry Huang, vice president of Birch Venture Capital, is responsible for investing in and monitoring portfolio companies. He has over ten-years experience in IT industry and venture fund investment. Prior to his current position, he served as investment manager at InveStar Capital and TTVC Capital for seven years and managed over 50 cases, in Taiwan, US and Mainland China. Before joined ventures, he was product manager of Darfon electronics, Inc.

Terry holds an MBA degree from the National Chiao-Tung University, and bachelor of science degree from the College of Engineering at National Taiwan University
